Html:
Hello All

I am a Outlook 2013 user. I am searching for risk free option to back my Outlook emails weekly. I tried so hard to take backup of email by my own but due to lack of time I failed to do so. Could anybody suggest me is it possible to schedule backup automatically

AidaJolley wrote:
HI

Outlook mail backup is necessary to restore as Outlook PST file have all information of user mailbox. Recently I was also trying to take backup of Outlook PST file using manual method but all my efforts are not giving me results. After headhunting I used Stellar Mail backup software and successfully backup my all emails without any risk of data loss. Moreover it resolves your problem automatically by providing you options to schedule your backup. I would suggest same for you for backup of emails.
Your suggestion seems quite interesting and I would like to test software once. Is there any option?
